entry.title: The Peculiar Employees of the Infinte Realms Delivery Services
entry.summary:
Author: Whymustwedolife

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,782Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 1,310

Summary: Dick had accepted Nightingale's job proposal and as far as he is concerned things have been going fine. Extremely fine even. Sure he hadn't been expecting that magic affinity but he wasn't complaining. Not when he could fling spells at Slade's face and get away with it. And his health insurance was insane! Anyone would've signed on for that alone considering the economy! But breaking bread with the fae leaves you changed, and these changes leave people concerned. Others wonder, just what happened to Dick Grayson? Follow along as we discover the peculiar habits of the Ghost King's couriers!

entry.title: Overwhelmed
entry.summary:
Author: maplesnmulberries

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,112Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: Duke is officially eighteen, and at a loss for what he's going to do after he finishes high school. College? A career? Moving out?The Batfamily is overbearing, even if they're trying to help, and Duke just wants a minute alone in PEACE.And that's when Damian shows up, demanding to join Signal on his daytime patrol.And it turns out...okay.(Duke & Damian bonding because I don't see enough of it and they're the last babies in the nest!!!!)--(This fic is part of my series: Bat Drabbles! Over 100k words, yippie! All stories happen within the same universe, but CAN be read separately. Still: would big love if you checked them out! Please click the link to the series page for their "order". Thanks!!!!)

entry.summary:

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,281Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 39

Summary: "I want to repair my relationships with my children."That had been Bruce’s stated goal during his first session with Dr. Blacklock. entry.title: Operation: Chaos on the Runway
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,288Chapters: 5/10Kudos: 63

Summary: In an epic celebration for reaching 4 million subscribers on Cass and Steph's channel, the duo decides to host a livestream guaranteed to break the internet. Their grand plan? Revealing to the world that the mysterious dancer "C" is none other than Cassandra Cain Wayne.But this revelation barely scratches the surface of the night's most explosive moments. With every family member determined to help celebrate, the fun atmosphere quickly escalates into a wild dance competition - because when have the Waynes ever done anything without turning it into a rivalry?Secretly rehearsed choreographies, ruthless judges, and a side bet about their boyfriends' reaction times turn the night into an absolute spectacle. The Batfamily's legendary intensity meets chaotic fun in this unforgettable livestream event where every move could spark new memes and every reveal sends the fandom into meltdown.

entry.title: The Boy In The Bathtub
entry.summary:
Author: ToastedToad

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,926Chapters: 21/29Kudos: 173

Summary: Jason Todd is a broke 16-year-old kid trying to get home from his after-hours job. He hears a muffled noise in an alley, he almost ignores it. But then he sees a boy, younger than him, bruised and bleeding, half-conscious in the grip of some serious monsters. Jason jumps in. Fights dirty. Manages to scare them off just enough. He grabs the kid and runs. Doesn’t know his name. Leaves him with a call to 911 and a fake name.Meanwhile, Damian is found. He’s safe. But he’s traumatized, and he doesn’t remember who saved him, just that the person had a red hoodie.

entry.title: mr. blue sky
entry.summary:
Author: brucewayneasscheeks (schvrll)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,417Chapters: 9/9Kudos: 33

Summary: The young man was announced to be the last of them, of an ancient civilization of men who lived in Krypton, the mythical state theorised to be located in the northernmost regions of the world. He was seen as an attraction, a new name and face destined to spill his blood in the Metropolis Arena. He was introduced with the simple name of Superman, which the other nobles in the room spoke with intrigue and slight reverence in their worlds, but Bruce could sense the mockery in Luthor’s voice. This wasn’t meant to be a celebration; it was humiliation disguised as goodwill. Bruce wondered what the young man had done to warrant such a thing. Knowing Lex, it probably wasn’t much. A story of two men finding their place in a world that seemed far too large for them in each other.

entry.title: Enveloped by Shadows : The Kidnapping of the Bat Family
entry.summary:
Author: KrystalWolf2001

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,177Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 6

Summary: In the dark underbelly of Gotham City, a centuries-old cult has long thrived, manipulating from the shadows. Their ultimate goal? Total dominion over the city. But there's one formidable obstacle in their path: Bruce Wayne, the enigmatic vigilante known as Batman. Rather than confronting him directly, the cunning cult devises a chilling strategy - to dismantle Batman's resolve by targeting his family, striking at his heart one member at a time. As Bruce struggles to protect those he loves while facing the relentless onslaught of the cult's machinations, he's pushed to his limits, confronting his deepest fears and questioning the essence of his crusade. With each move, the stakes escalate, culminating in a high-stakes showdown where Gotham's fate hangs in the balance, and Batman must confront not just his enemies but also the shadows of his past.

entry.title: Long Live the Grit King
entry.summary:
Author: Mia_Da_Cat

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,024Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 72

Summary: Sequel to "The Gritty Wisdom of Jason Todd".The Bat-family has sworn fealty to their new, gritty, no-belly-button Batman. The problem? Jason is still high, and now they have to get him home.Follow the newly-dubbed "Grit Knights Council" as they hold sacred trials in the alley where Jason once stubbed his toe, perform the legendary "Gotham Brood Strut," and establish a new Batcave (the 'Grotto of Grit') in the wine cellar. Meanwhile, Bruce has seen the footage and is coming to reclaim his title. He is about to learn a terrible truth: You can't ground Batman.(Features 24 unhinged voicemails and a tragic eulogy for a donut.)

entry.title: Dome Protocol
entry.summary:
Author: ToTheLastWord

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 77,585Chapters: 10/12Kudos: 547

Summary: “I think he created the device for an end-of-the-world scenario,” Bruce said, voice carefully neutral. When a mysterious device sends the Batkids' future sons and daughters to the past, right in the middle of the cave, none of them is ready. Not the new kids, whose family as they know it is back in a different time, and certainly not Bruce's own children, too young to be parents.With the six now stuck in a time in which they don't exist yet, hurt by a future that will never be, the Batkids will have to decide what it truly means to be a family and how to face the ghosts of choices not yet taken.AKAThe Batkids meet their future children and everything gets complicated.- - - -Part of a series dedicated to the Batkids' kids, this is a STAND-ALONE fic.

entry.title: Bruce Goes Batty
entry.summary:
Author: AtlasDaMoth

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,084Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 229

Summary: In Bruce Wayne's opinion, as The Batman and Gotham's Billionaire, magic was both incredibly illogical, and quite stupid. Guns, swords, secret plots and evil schemes, he could deal with it all. Except for magic. Spells, curses, it was all unknown to him, and he hated it.He formed that idea on the subject at least a good three years ago. And now, as he stares at himself in the mirror, shaking hands gripping the long bat ears that had sprouted upon his head, he finds himself proven right yet again.Magic. Stupid, stupid magic.
